name: Tower Knight Joust
description:
The game was made as part of a week-long project in a team of 11 people.
We have to adapt the subject "Twin-stick" as we wanted.
Taking a humorous angle, and drawing inspiration from games like Gang Beast or Human Fall Flat, we created Tower Knight Joust!

This project is similar to a JAM game.

We hope you like it and we look forward to reading your comments and feedback.

The project is currently finished for the version that was requested from us, according to your feedback we will see if we will make changes / improvements About the team: Game Designers: (5)
  • Bastien Prigent: Game Designer / UI / Tech Designer : https://sonbabouch.itch.io 
  • Come Richetta:  Game Designer / Tech Designer 
  • Noé Blanc:  Game Designer / Level Design : https://roptur.itch.io 
  • Aurélien Mary:  Game Designer / Tech Designer
  • Marianne Cetkovic: Documentation / Sound Designer / Project Initiator
Game Artist: (5)
  • Marine Mazurier: Environment Artist
  • Maelle Hanneton: Chara + Tech + UI Artist : https://mael-strom.itch.io 
  • Fanny Dufour: Environment Artist
  • Kilian Marion--Miraca: Animation + 3D model
  • Justine Catteau: 3D modeling
Programmer: (1)
  • Thomas Depraz Depland : Programmer : https://ciboul-tte.itch.io
